cleaned_text: Requests (PDF)](https://www.maine.gov/pfr/professionallicensing/sites/maine.gov.pfr.professionallicensing/files/inline-files/policy_license_verifications_0.pdf) Effective March 1, 2019, the Office of Professional and Occupational Regulation (OPOR) will no longer issue paper license verifications. License verifications are available, free of charge, on OPOR's official database, [https://www.pfr.maine.gov/ALMSOnline/ALMSQuery/Welcome.aspx?board=4400.](https://www.pfr.maine.gov/almsonline/almsquery/welcome.aspx?board=4400) This database is updated in real time as changes occur. The Office of Professional and Occupational Regulation considers this information to be a secure, primary source for license verification.
